headline: Odyssey Logistics hit with a 2nd Moody’s ratings downgrade since September
summary: For the second time in three months, Odyssey Logistics has seen Moody’s cut its debt rating. The post Odyssey Logistics hit with a 2nd Moody’s ratings downgrade since September appeared first on FreightWaves.
